item.description:
This is similar to something we've talked about. I plan on going to check it out. Not sure if I'll fly Young Eagles. Depends on how many planes they have and need... Anyone looking to fly a couple more, this does count towards your EAA count. Remember to put your chapter number on the form.
Charley

Chapter 1314 is having a Young Eagles Flight Rally on Saturday May 30,2009 (rain date Sunday May 31) at the Keene Airport Main Terminal starting at 11:00 AM to 3:00PM and I am hoping you can help by flying some Young Eagles.

This is part of Aviation Day at the airport with New England Aerobatics Club Practice Sessions, Radio Controlled Aircraft Flights and Display, Parachute Jumping and Packing Demonstration, Face Painting and Food Vendors

Parking For Young Eagles Pilot Is On Taxiway Romeo

Romeo Taxiway is at the North End of Runway 02/20.

There will be a Pilot Briefing at 10:30 AM in the Terminal.

Terminal Ramp will be closed to G/A aircraft; this will be for Static Display Aircraft.

G/A Aircraft will be parking on Runway 32/14 North/West of Runway 02/20.

Call 603-357-7600 if it looks like rain.

Thanks Don Green
Phone # 603-446-3989
Cell # 603-499-1323

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Keene Fly In, Young Eagles Flights and more
